data.actual_result: Needs to change Overwatch to windows mode outside of OW.
data.expected_result: Doesnt need to change to windows mode outside of overwatch to get the overlay.
data.short_description: Overlay doesnt appear on overwatch. Bug Bounty: <https://goo.gl/MpZjA9>
data.steps_to_repro: - Restart computer if already on. (Since i played OW this morning trying to repro this bug) - Open up overwatch. See no overlay. - to get overlay, open up GeForce Experiance and click revert settings (windowed mode) - Load up overwatch, see overlay. - change to Fullscreen. Overlay works again.
